title: Font ID!
content:
I’m Desperate to Identify this font guys, (this dodgy jpeg I attached is the only image I have of it). It kind of looks like a geometric Garamond?  
Anyway, if anyone could Identify this badboy I will love you forever.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124940/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-4_3.jpg) | 570.45 KB |
author: spankyg

comments.content:
A robust serif design pretty close to [Trump Mediaeval Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trump-mediaeval/bold/) except for the finial on C.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TrumpMedieavalBold_6298.jpg)
  
Don't know offhand whether the difference is because there is a closer font or because of design editing.  
Close C's in Congress & Proteus.  
Don
